tweet: Thanks to @TeamCavuto for having me on today to discuss House Democrats’ sham impeachment resolution on @FoxNews. We need to end this political theater and get back to work for the American people. Watch the clip here: https://video.foxnews.com/v/6099565365001/ …

Glad to join @KDKAShumway on  @KDKARadio this morning to discuss President Trump’s Pittsburgh visit in support of American energy and Dems’ sham impeachment inquiry. Listen here: https://kdkaradio.radio.com/media/audio-channel/congressman-guy-reschenthaler-r-pa-14th-district-impeachment-inquiry …

For over a month, House Democrats conducted a sham impeachment behind closed doors. This long overdue floor vote doesn’t reverse weeks of secret hearings and leaking cherry-picked items to the media. https://www.wsj.com/articles/trumps-unfairness-advantage-11572302906 …

Too many of our veterans are experiencing mental illness, substance abuse, & homelessness that lands them in the criminal justice system. As a veteran and former district judge, I'm proud to support #VetTreatmentCourtAct to get non-violent veterans into treatment instead of jail.

Grateful to @realDonaldTrump for establishing the #CommissiononLawEnforcement to stand up for our police & make our communities safer. Like my bill the #STOICAct, the commission will help address mental health & suicide prevention needs & other issues facing law enforcement.

One year ago, a heinous act of terrorism took the lives of 11 of our friends and neighbors at #TreeofLife synagogue in Pittsburgh. We must stand united against anti-Semitism and all forms of hate. My thoughts & prayers are with the families and victims of this horrific attack.

Due to construction on my district office in Washington, PA, please be aware that we will be relocated to Senator Bartolotta’s Washington office tomorrow and Tuesday, at 95 W. Beau St, Suite 107. We remain ready to serve the constituents of the 14th district.

The death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi is a testament to @realDonaldTrump’s unwavering commitment to the fight against ISIS and the eradication of their caliphate. I thank him for his leadership, and I want to congratulate everyone involved in this tremendous accomplishment. (3/3)
and around the world. Our men and women in the US military and intelligence community have shown incredible bravery and resolve in the fight against ISIS, and we are eternally grateful. (2/3)

Today’s announcement that US special operations forces carried out a daring, successful, textbook raid to kill the most wanted and ruthless terrorist in the world confirms the boundless strength and reach of the US military and counterterrorism operations in the Middle East (1/3)

Tomorrow is National Prescription Drug #TakeBackDay. This week, I introduced the Directing Returning Opioid Prescriptions Act, which requires the VA to ensure their facilities have locations for safe disposal of controlled substances. Find a site near you:  https://takebackday.dea.gov  pic.twitter.com/58ngTfBygd

Always glad to join @MartyGriffinKD on @KDKARadio. Today we discussed the Marcellus #shale boom and how @realDonaldTrump has supported Pennsylvania #energy and the jobs that go with it. https://kdkaradio.radio.com/media/audio-channel/fracking-us-congressman-guy-reschenthaler …

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for visiting @MarcellusGas @SHALEINSIGHT in #Pittsburgh and for all you have done to support the Pennsylvania energy and manufacturing boom. With your help, we are making America the greatest energy superpower in the world. #ShaleInsight pic.twitter.com/YQk1NYOkdu

Enjoyed our flight to SWPA with President Trump and @SecretaryPerry to see the hardworking men and women who are driving innovation in the American shale energy industry. Thanks to @realDonaldTrump for the ride on @AirForce1. pic.twitter.com/3a9nr1TasJ

Arnold "The King" Palmer joins Fred Rogers as the second constituent of PA-14 to receive a forever stamp. Earlier this year, I led the effort to ask the United States Coast Guard to honor Mr. Palmer with a USCG vessel bearing his name and legacy. https://es.pn/340kQob

Proud to vote for the #PACTAct, which passed the House today. As a cosponsor of the bill, I strongly support this effort to combat animal cruelty so we can better protect our nation’s animals from abuse and torture.  #ProtectOurPets pic.twitter.com/8JgnXFoDQN

Enjoyed discussing criminal justice reform in @JudiciaryGOP today. My time as a district judge helped me understand that ultimately, we can reduce crime by ending the revolving door between prison and the streets. You can be strong on crime while also being smart on crime. pic.twitter.com/Qefrs3RvX7

Today I joined @JudiciaryGOP to call for a vote on the Debbie Smith Act which will help address the backlog of untested rape kits. @SenateGOP already passed this bill, which expired on 9/30. @SpeakerPelosi & @HouseDemocrats need to bring it up NOW so we can #endthebacklog.

Proud to support the Preventing Online Sales of E-Cigarettes to Children Act to help address the startling rise in teen e-cigarette use. By regulating internet sales of e-cigarettes, we can cut down on youth access & illicit sellers without affecting law-abiding adults users. pic.twitter.com/nVsW2odkjb

Proud to vote for the Homeless Veteran Families Act, which passed the House today. As a veteran and a cosponsor of this bill, I believe it is our responsibility to help our nation’s veterans and their families stay together.

SW PA has a rich history in farming & agricultural traditions that continues today in our community. Last week, I enjoyed hearing from farmers in our area as well as @PAFarmBureau President Rick Ebert on different topics, and I look forward to working with them in the future. pic.twitter.com/K2Um8pROC7

Happy 244th birthday to the @USNavy. It was an honor of a lifetime to serve our nation as a Navy JAG officer. Best wishes to the sailors and marines protecting us at home and abroad and promoting the navy’s core values of Honor, Courage, and Commitment. https://twitter.com/secnav76/status/1182643615811674113 …

This week, I visited a coke plant in Monessen along the Monongahela River, where I saw firsthand how they produce high quality coke used in domestic steel production. Today I toured Cleveland Brothers Caterpillar facility in Murrysville, where we discussed different issues they face and how recent economic growth has helped job creators in our community. Thanks to @CBEC_Cat for a great visit and all you do for southwestern PA. pic.twitter.com/Jx1oQmnO9R
